name: Endless Legend
description: Due to a regression in wine 2.19 through at least 2.21 Endless Legend currently needs a wine version which Lutris currently only provides for x86_64 (64 Bit) architecture. Since the game and the original installer supported i386 (32 Bit) architecture this installer installs Endless Legend into a 64 Bit Wine Steam prefix configured to use this specific wine version.
content:
game:
  appid: 289130
  arch: win64
winesteam:
  version: staging-2.18-x86_64
